content: Studies have also shown that when plants are under attack they release aromatic chemicals. Those chemicals attract friendly insects that attack the bugs eating the plant. Schultz says this chemical signaling can be easily detected by one of nature's most sophisticated sniffers, dogs.
translations: ita:Studi hanno anche dimostrato che quando le piante sono sotto attacco rilasciano sostanze chimiche aromatiche. Tali sosta
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
